Fire Spotter.desc: Slightly increases effect of Direct Fire action.

MG Spotter.desc: Greatly increases effect of Direct Fire action when attacking with a Machine Gun.

Gun Spotter.desc: Greatly increases effect of Direct Fire action when attacking with a Gun.

Driver Direction.desc: Slightly increases effect of Direct Movement action.

Lay of the Land.desc: Greatly increases effect of Direct Movement action when attempting Hull Down.

Forward!.desc: Greatly increases effect of Direct Movement action when moving forward.

Enemy Spotted!.desc: Less chance of being ambushed at the start of a battle encounter.

Quick Trigger.desc: Slightly increases chance of maintaining Rate of Fire when firing a Gun.

Time on Target.desc: Greatly increases chance of maintaining Rate of Fire when firing a Gun at a stationary target.

Burst Fire.desc: Slightly increases chance of maintaining Rate of Fire when firing a Machine Gun.

Crack Shot.desc: Slightly increases chance to hit when firing a Gun.

Target Tracker.desc: Greatly increases chance to hit firing a Gun at a moving target.

Sniper.desc: Greatly increases chance to hit firing a Gun at a long-range target.

Target Focus.desc: Reduces the effect of precipitation when firing a Gun.

Knows Weak Spots.desc: Slightly increases chance of scoring a Critical Hit when firing a Gun at an armoured target.

Fast Hands.desc: Slightly increases chance of maintaining Rate of Fire when reloading a Gun.

Quick Shifter.desc: Slightly increases chance of a successful Move Forward or Backward action.

Eye for Cover.desc: Slightly increases chance to achieve Hull Down status after moving.

Eagle Eyed.desc: When hatch is open, slightly increases chance to spot and identify enemy units.

Gymnast.desc: Slightly increases chance to successfully bail out.

Blitzkrieg.desc: Modern warfare relies on shock attacks from fast-moving armoured and motorized units. Travel time on the Campaign Day map is reduced.

Defend the Motherland.desc: The very future of your nation is at stake. Crew start with a higher morale stat.

Centralized Fire.desc: Assault guns and artillery batteries coordinate to concentrate fire on targets. Artillery attacks are more effective and more likely to be granted.

Motti.desc: Finnish troops know the terrain very well, and concentrate on isolating pockets of enemy forces. Finnish forces cannot be ambushed, and tanks are less likely to bog in snowy terrain.

Defensive Strategy.desc: The French command has been planning for years for a defensive, Great War style conflict. Destroying enemy units is worth 1 extra VP, but capturing hex zones 1 less VP.

To Victory!.desc: Canadian troops are all volunteers, and are highly trained and motivated, quickly gaining a reputation as assault troops. Crewmen start with a higher Grit stat.

Superior Firepower.desc: American forces are well-supplied with ammunition, and are not afraid to use it. Rate of Fire chance for all machine gun weapons is increased.
